name: Ding (GreenBoxGames, crfellows2)
description:
This game was made by Me and crfellows2 in one week for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1!

A game where you play as the Ding priest. Amass followers and use strategic positioning to convert enemies. Grow your cult and reach the great bell monument. You are stronger together.

WASD to move

SPACE to place followers

E to recall followers

This is the first project I've done in unity!

Unfortunately we ran out of time so no audio for this one.
